message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, considering the inflation rates, it's a good deal for both of us.
I understand the inflation puts me at a disadvantage, but 40% is too low. How about a 45-55 split?
Considering the inflation, my previous offer was generous. I can do 58-42, but that's as far as I'll go.
This is a compromise. The inflation is hurting me more, but I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle.
I see you're willing to compromise, but I still think I can get a bit more. 57-43 is my new offer.
Alice, we're running out of time! This is my final offer.  We're both losing out to inflation with each passing round.
